14. Bibliography¶

CDPC20

Diederik Coppitters, Ward De Paepe, and Francesco Contino. Robust design optimization and stochastic performance analysis of a grid-connected photovoltaic system with battery storage and hydrogen storage. Energy, 213:118798, 2020.

DPAM02

Kalyanmoy Deb, Amrit Pratap, Sameer Agarwal, and T. Meyarivan. A fast and elitist multiobjective genetic algorithm: NSGA-II. IEEE Transactions on Evolutionary Computation, 6(2):182–197, 2002.

Ste87

Michael Stein. Large sample properties of simulations using latin hypercube sampling. Technometrics, 29(2):143–151, 1987.

Sud14

Bruno Sudret. Polynomial chaos expansions and stochastic finite-element methods. Risk and Reliability in Geotechnical Engineering, Chap. 6(2003):265–300, 2014.

XK02

Dongbin Xiu and George Em Karniadakis. The Wiener–Askey polynomial chaos for stochastic differential equations. SIAM journal on scientific computing, 24(2):619–644, 2002.

MonteroCarreroSanchezP+19

Marina Montero Carrero, Irene Rodríguez Sánchez, Ward De Paepe, Alessandro Parente, and Francesco Contino. Is There a Future for Small-Scale Cogeneration in Europe ? Economic and Policy Analysis of the Internal Humid Air Turbine Cycles. Energies, 12(3):1–27, 2019.
